Package: org.jlab.analysis

[Groovy] Class MomentumCorrections

    • org.jlab.analysis.MomentumCorrections 
    • @groovy.transform.CompileStatic
class MomentumCorrections
extends java.lang.Object

      Implements Andrey Kim (andrey.kim@uconn.edu) and Nicholaus Trotta's (nicholaus.trotta@uconn.edu) momentum corrections: version 5/19/2025.

      Version:
      1.0
      Authors:
      Matthew McEneaney
